Title: Coffee, Black
Writer: Whit Anderson, Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman (story editor), Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Russ learns Agent Petty's true identity and makes plans to murder, steal and flee. Wendy stumbles on an ideal business to add to the Byrde portfolio.
